Initialize OpenAI voice agents workshop with WebSocket implementation

Key features:
- Basic text-based agent implementation using OpenAI Agents SDK
- Next.js voice agent with real-time audio streaming via WebSocket
- Server-side token generation with proper authentication
- Client-side audio processing with PCM16 format conversion
- Fixed WebRTC ''setRemoteDescription'' error by switching to direct WebSocket connection
- Documented complete debugging process and solutions
